name: Iterm2-material-colors
tagline: A theme / color scheme for iTerm2 based on Google's Material Design Color Palette
body:
# iTerm2 Material Design

This is an iTerm2 color scheme based on [Google's Material Design Color Palette](http://www.google.com/design/spec/style/color.html).

![screen](https://github.com/MartinSeeler/iterm2-material-colors/raw/master/img/screen-mock-1.jpg)

![terminal](https://github.com/MartinSeeler/iterm2-material-colors/raw/master/img/screen-mock-2.jpg)

![terminal2](https://github.com/MartinSeeler/iterm2-material-colors/raw/master/img/screen-mock-3.jpg)

![colors](https://github.com/MartinSeeler/iterm2-material-colors/raw/master/img/colors.png)

## How to use it

1. Clone the repo or download the file `material-design-colors.itermcolors`
2. *iTerm2 > Preferences > Profiles > Colors Tab*
3. Click *Load Presets...*
4. Click *Import...*
5. Select the `material-design-colors.itermcolors` file
5. Select the *material-design-colors* from *Load Presets...*


> Wallpaper used in the screenshots: [softe wallpaper by jivebs](http://jivebs.deviantart.com/art/softe-wallpaper-392758319)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
